Divine Unity.quote: Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God, the LORD is one. (Deuteronomy 6:4)

Divine Eternity.quote: Before the mountains were born or you brought forth the whole world, from everlasting to everlasting you are God. (Psalm 90:2)

Divine Creation.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Divine Presence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Divine Covenant.quote: I will establish my covenant as an everlasting covenant between me and you and your descendants after you. (Genesis 17:7)

Divine Justice.quote: He is the Rock, his works are perfect, and all his ways are just. (Deuteronomy 32:4)

Divine Mercy.quote: The LORD, the LORD, the compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness. (Exodus 34:6)

Divine Holiness.quote: Holy, holy, holy is the LORD Almighty; the whole earth is full of his glory. (Isaiah 6:3)

Divine Wisdom.quote: The LORD by wisdom founded the earth; by understanding he established the heavens. (Proverbs 3:19)

Divine Power.quote: Ah, Sovereign LORD, you have made the heavens and the earth by your great power and outstretched arm. Nothing is too hard for you. (Jeremiah 32:17)

Divine Protection.quote: The LORD is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer. (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Leadership.quote: The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing. (Psalm 23:1)

Divine Law.quote: The law of the LORD is perfect, refreshing the soul. (Psalm 19:7)

Divine Judgment.quote: For the LORD is our judge, the LORD is our lawgiver, the LORD is our king. (Isaiah 33:22)

Divine Providence.quote: I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not to harm you. (Jeremiah 29:11)

Divine Knowledge.quote: O LORD, you have searched me and you know me. (Psalm 139:1)

Divine Victory.quote: The LORD will fight for you; you need only to be still. (Exodus 14:14)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: The earth is the LORD's, and everything in it, the world, and all who live in it. (Psalm 24:1)

Divine Redemption.quote: I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine. (Isaiah 43:1)

Divine Glory.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Promise.quote: Not one of all the LORD's good promises to Israel failed; every one was fulfilled. (Joshua 21:45)

Divine Voice.quote: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is majestic. (Psalm 29:4)

Divine Peace.quote: The LORD bless you and keep you; the LORD make his face shine on you and be gracious to you. (Numbers 6:24-25)

Divine Healing.quote: I am the LORD, who heals you. (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Guidance.quote: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path. (Psalm 119:105)

Divine Kingship.quote: The LORD reigns forever and ever. (Exodus 15:18)

Divine Faithfulness.quote: Your faithfulness continues through all generations. (Psalm 119:90)

Divine Dwelling.quote: Let them construct a sanctuary for Me, that I may dwell among them. (Exodus 25:8)
